root.name: MVP 07 NCAA Baseball
root.description: New FeaturesA day-to-night transition during the games, better simulating Friday night games.Full ESPN Broadcast Integration—Stay up to date with ESPN Radio, news, and ticker feeds and in the action with expert commentary by Mike Patrick The Complete College Baseball Experience—Includes NCAA fight songs and actual College World Series footage, plus new teams, stadiums, and conferences.Play Baseball Your Way— Change lineups, rosters, and even which bat you use.More Ways to Play—Choose from a variety of pitching and hitting mini-games, manage all aspects of your school in Dynasty Mode, start your own tournament, or head online and take on MVP 07 NCAA Baseball players across the nation.
